an7.14:1.3: Ubhatobhagavimutto, pannavimutto, kayasakkhi, ditthippatto, saddhavimutto, dhammanusari, saddhanusari.
an7.14:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassaâ€ti.
